501: Didn't found a voter with this student ID

502.title: You already have an open check-in session
502.message: Refresh the page to start a new session.

503: Apple iPhones may have problems using this service. You may use Android, MacOS, Windows or Linux.

506.title: Is the camera alright?
506.message: Check the permissions for your camera.

507.title: Scanning error
507.message: Try to improve the lighting and avoid bright lights.

508.title: You've been away for too long
508.message: Cancel this session and start a new one.

509.title: Oops, haven't found anyone
509.message: Check the query again. If it's correct, turn to one of the election officers.

510.title: Not now.
510.message: The action is only allowed during the election time

511.title: Oops, too many results
511.message: Try to input your full name

512.title: Already checked in
512.message: Voter with this ID has checked in before.

514.title: Something's wrong
514.message: You used a different ID last time.

516.title: Logged out
516.message: Ask one of the election officers to sign in.

517.title: Is this an election officer account?
517.message: Only election officers are allowed to check voters in

519.title: Logged out
519.message: Ask one of the election officers to sign in.

520.title: Is this an election officer account?
520.message: Only election officers are allowed to check voters in
